name: I'M The Hero (JoGBear)
description:
Knauble, Hobble, and Wobble are 3 adventurers out to save the day! After looting the cave of the dragon Smauble, they are ambushed by hordes of goblins. You must protect your treasure, but our heroes are known for their arrogance, and will each try to steal the spotlight. Can you survive the infighting and the goblin hordes, or will your treasure be stolen by King Gobble?

Instructions: Press and Release to attack, hold the button to charge a strong attack.
